main event: Dr. Frank M. Linville observed a yellow-orange luminous object moving in the sky over Denver, Colorado.
interesting points: Dr. Linville estimated the object's diameter at approximately 500 yards,The object was moving at an estimated speed of 3,000 knots,The object made no sound and left no visible trail,The sighting lasted around 2 minutes,The report indicates a need for further investigation.
witness description: Dr. Frank M. Linville, a high school physics teacher
